Major.name: The Fool
Major.general: The Fool represents new journeys, risk-taking, and stepping into the unknown with trust in life.

Major.name: The Magician
Major.general: The Magician signifies the ability to turn ideas into reality using skills, focus, and determination.

Major.name: The High Priestess
Major.upright: Intuition, unconscious knowledge, divine feminine, mystery.
Major.reversed: Secrets, disconnected from intuition, withdrawal, silence.
Major.general: The High Priestess invites you to trust your intuition and embrace hidden wisdom beyond logic.

Major.name: The Empress
Major.general: The Empress embodies growth, creativity, and the nurturing energy of motherly love and nature.

Major.name: The Emperor
Major.general: The Emperor represents order, discipline, and the stabilizing influence of strong leadership.

Major.name: The Hierophant
Major.general: The Hierophant represents conventional wisdom, learning from tradition, and spiritual guidance.

Major.name: The Lovers
Major.general: The Lovers card signifies deep connection, meaningful relationships, and important choices guided by values.

Major.name: The Chariot
Major.general: The Chariot represents control, determination, and the ability to overcome challenges with focus.

Major.name: Strength
Major.general: Strength symbolizes the quiet power of patience, compassion, and gentle determination.

Major.name: The Hermit
Major.general: The Hermit calls for reflection, inner searching, and finding wisdom through solitude.

Major.name: Wheel of Fortune
Major.upright: Good luck, destiny, life cycles, change.
Major.reversed: Bad luck, resistance to change, setbacks.
Major.general: The Wheel of Fortune symbolizes cycles of change, fate, and the ups and downs of life.

Major.name: Justice
Major.general: Justice represents truth, fairness, and the law of cause and effect.

Major.name: The Hanged Man
Major.upright: Pause, surrender, new perspective, letting go.
Major.general: The Hanged Man calls for a shift in perspective, patience, and surrendering control.

Major.name: Death
Major.reversed: Resistance to change, stagnation, fear of new beginnings.
Major.general: Death symbolizes transformation, closure, and the start of a new chapter.

Major.name: Temperance
Major.reversed: Imbalance, excess, conflict, lack of harmony.
Major.general: Temperance represents the art of balance, blending, and harmonious living.

Major.name: The Devil
Major.general: The Devil warns of unhealthy attachments but also represents awareness of temptation.

Major.name: The Tower
Major.general: The Tower symbolizes sudden upheaval that clears the way for new growth.

Major.name: The Star
Major.general: The Star represents faith, guidance, and renewal after challenges.

Major.name: The Moon
Major.general: The Moon symbolizes the subconscious, dreams, and navigating through uncertainty.

Major.name: The Sun
Major.general: The Sun radiates happiness, success, and positivity in all aspects of life.

Major.name: Judgement
Major.reversed: Self-doubt, failure to learn lessons, stagnation.
Major.general: Judgement calls for self-reflection, forgiveness, and spiritual awakening.

Major.name: The World
Major.general: The World represents completion, integration, and reaching a sense of fulfillment.

Cups.name: Ace of Cups
Cups.general: Represents beginnings in emotional life or relationships

Cups.name: 3 of Cups
Cups.general: Represents joyful social gatherings and support networks

Cups.name: 5 of Cups
Cups.general: Represents mourning a loss but also the potential to recover

Cups.name: 6 of Cups
Cups.general: Represents reconnecting with innocence and simpler times

Cups.name: 7 of Cups
Cups.general: Represents multiple options and the need for clarity

Cups.name: 8 of Cups
Cups.general: Represents the decision to leave something unfulfilling behind

Cups.name: 9 of Cups
Cups.general: Represents emotional fulfillment and achieving goals

Cups.name: 10 of Cups
Cups.general: Represents long-term happiness and emotional completion

Cups.name: Page of Cups
Cups.general: Represents new beginnings in emotional matters or intuition

Cups.name: Knight of Cups
Cups.general: Represents action in emotional pursuits or following your heart

Cups.name: Queen of Cups
Cups.general: Represents emotional balance and empathetic leadership

Cups.name: King of Cups
Cups.general: Represents mastery over emotions and guiding others compassionately

Swords.name: Ace of Swords
Swords.general: Represents mental clarity, decisions, and insight

Swords.name: 3 of Swords
Swords.general: Represents emotional pain but also growth from loss

Swords.name: 4 of Swords
Swords.general: Represents taking time to heal and recharge

Swords.name: 5 of Swords
Swords.general: Represents challenging encounters and ethical dilemmas

Swords.name: 6 of Swords
Swords.general: Represents leaving difficulties behind and moving forward

Swords.name: 7 of Swords
Swords.general: Represents planning carefully and being cautious

Swords.name: 8 of Swords
Swords.general: Represents feeling trapped mentally and seeking solutions

Swords.name: 9 of Swords
Swords.general: Represents mental anguish but opportunity for recovery

Swords.name: 10 of Swords
Swords.general: Represents a painful ending and opportunity for a fresh start

Swords.name: Queen of Swords
Swords.general: Represents mental clarity, honesty, and experience

Wands.name: Ace of Wands
Wands.upright: New opportunities, inspiration, and creative energy.
Wands.reversed: Delays, lack of motivation, or missed opportunities.
Wands.general: Focus on new projects or ventures.

Wands.name: 2 of Wands
Wands.reversed: Fear of unknown, indecision, or lack of planning.
Wands.general: Time to consider options and take initiative.

Wands.name: 3 of Wands
Wands.general: Keep vision wide and plan ahead.

Wands.name: 4 of Wands
Wands.reversed: Conflict at home or postponed celebrations.

Wands.name: 5 of Wands
Wands.general: Learn from differences, grow through challenges.

Wands.name: 7 of Wands
Wands.general: Stand firm and protect your ideas.

Wands.name: King of Wands
Wands.general: Take charge wisely and inspire others.

Pentacles.name: 4 of Pentacles
Pentacles.general: Maintain balance between saving and sharing.

Pentacles.name: 5 of Pentacles
Pentacles.general: Seek assistance and keep moving forward.

Pentacles.name: 8 of Pentacles
Pentacles.reversed: Lack of focus, poor quality, cutting corners.
Pentacles.general: Commit to mastery of your craft.

Pentacles.name: 10 of Pentacles
Pentacles.general: Focus on long-term security and family.

Pentacles.name: Queen of Pentacles
Pentacles.general: Care for yourself and others wisely.
